alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 23 at 8:32PM CST until January 25 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 90 mph possible. * WHERE...Cocke Smoky Mountains, Blount Smoky Mountains and Sevier Smoky Mountains Counties. Including the adjacent Foothills. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Campers and hikers may want to postpone their trip for another day. The high winds will produce hazardous conditions due to the potential of down trees.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains
